item.title: Ways to Free Up Disk Space on Your Computer for Python Developers
item.description: Below are some ways to free up disk space on your computer. This will be most helpful for Ubuntu users and Python developers. The pip examples show what I used on my Python version 3.11, so if you're running a different version use that number, like pip3.12, pip3 â€¦
